choices.label: ​The graphs of <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="r equals g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are identical in shape and location.

​​The graph of <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a reflection of the graph of <math alttext="r equals g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> over the positive <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis (polar axis).

​​​The graph of <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a translation of the graph of <math alttext="r equals g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​​​The graph of <math alttext="r equals f open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a rotation of the graph of <math alttext="r equals g open parentheses theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> about the origin.
